mapper.insert: insert into CHECKLIST_HIS (ID, CHECKLIST_ID, PRIMARY_ID, CREATE_TIME, OPER_USER_ID, CONTROL, DEAL_CONTENT, REMARK) values (CHECKLIST_HIS_SEQ.nextval, #{checklistId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{primaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{control,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
